text: Nikola Jean Caro (born 20 September 1966) is a New Zealand movie director and screenwriter. She is best known for directing the 2002 movie Whale Rider and the 2020 live action version of Disney's Mulan. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand movie directors Category:New Zealand screenwriters Category:Writers from Wellington
title: Niki Caro
